title: #134 - Corruption and Game Theory
description: And we're back! After missing a week, Connor and Dan are back to talk about bees, ants, police, and game theory. But this ain't frivolous bug talk. This is a serious exploration of how to avoid corruption in complex societies. Very serious. Also, we're drunk. Apologies for Connor's mic this week, which is explained in the episode, but things should be back to normal next week. Enjoy!
